title: Bai Bian Xiao Ba season3
synopsis: "Variety School Bus 3" will continue the story of an artificial intelligence school bus dedicated to Sunshine Forest Kindergarten and the children. The safety of the children is guarded by me. Whenever the children get into trouble, the Variety School Bus will transform into a fire truck, a police car, an ambulance, a rescue boat and an airplane and rush to the scene to help. As the story develops, the children gradually learn more about safety education and emotional management. The animation of "Variety School Bus" uses a fun and vivid way to answer children's growth problems, and at the same time establish a deep friendship and trust with the children. Now, in the third season of the brand new "Variety School Bus", the Variety School Bus will continue to accompany the children's experience and growth, and protect their smiles! (translated from iqiyi)
